mapper.select: select A.GATE_UUID as gateUuid, A.NO as no, A.GATE_ID as gateId, A.GATE_NAME as gateName, A.MODE_UUID as modeUuid, A.SENSOR_USE_YN as sensorUseYn, A.IN_ZONE_UUID as inZoneUuid, B.ZONE_NAME as inZoneName, A.OUT_ZONE_UUID as outZoneUuid, C.ZONE_NAME as outZoneName, A.LIGHT_BAR_STATUS_UUID as lightBarStatusUuid from ST_GATE A LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_ZONE B ON A.IN_ZONE_UUID = B.ZONE_UUID LEFT OUTER JOIN ST_ZONE C ON A.OUT_ZONE_UUID = C.ZONE_UUID WHERE 1=1
